column2: The Shadow Thieves are a versatile criminal guild that deal in ten different criminal activities. They are Assassins, Beggars, Bounty Hunters, Con Artists and Tricksters, Burglars, Cutpurses and Pickpockets, Enforcers and Thugs, Racketeers, Scouts and Spies, Fences, Smugglers and Pirates. They are a strongly structured organization, using this as an advantage to avoid any action that desegregates the whole organization.
The Grandmaster of Shadows is the supreme leader of the Shadow Thieves. They run the Shadow Council which determines the important decisions of the guild.
Those who have not yet proven themselves are simply a Shadow Thief, nothing more.
The Silhouettes are the local guild masters, given autonomous control over one of the ten criminal activies in which the Shadow Thieves deal.
One Cloakmaster administers an area of a maximum of 10,000 people. The hierarchy of the Shadow Thieves combined with the Cloakmaster's skill ensures the law will have a difficult time keeping up.

The Shadow Council divides the Realms territory in each region, with each Shadow Councilor acting as supreme leader of that territory. They lead the Cloakmasters and are only outranked by the Grandmaster of Shadows.

The Harpers are a semi-secret organization dedicated to promoting good, preserving history (including art and music of old) and maintaining a balance between civilization and nature by keeping kingdoms small and the destruction of plant life to a minimum. The original Harpers were founded by Myth Drannan Elves and took their name and symbol from their founder's family crest.
While the High Harpers have no one above them, there is always one High Harper who is given the respectful position of first among equals.
A new initiative to the Harpers. These individuals are dedicated to battling evil, discovering and preserving forgotten lore, and maintaining the balance between nature and civilization.

The Harper agents or "scouts" are scattered all across Faerûn. Harper agents are the "field agents" of the Harper organization, acting directly to gather intelligence and eliminate threats to the greater good.

Master Harpers are the elite agents of the Harpers. They study spells and develop many skills to help them in their duties of preserving lore by imparting it to others, raising morale and aiding other members of the Harpers as well as others who promote similar aims.
The High Harpers are a council of powerful individuals who plan the long-term goals of the Harpers.

The Eldreth Veluuthra or Victorious Blade of the People in common, was formed in 262 DR to investigate the threat humans face to elves. They decided that humans were equivalent to vermin, and have since been dedicated to the stop of human expansion and the eventual removal of all human kind from Faerûn. They are recruited from the most wealthy elves who fund and lead the organization, as well as the most impoverished and disillusioned elves who act as expendable saboteurs.
The head of the Vel'Nikeryma is the most respected member. They are a devastating scourge to humankind.

The cell members of the Eldreth Veluuthra go about their daily lives, working or maintaining families, and take up duties when called for. Although there are a few adventuring companies, these generally do not last long due to the high casualties involved in such a cell style.
Cells decide their leadership from among their members. If a leader could not be removed by diplomatic means, approval from the Vel'Nikeryma was sought to take further measures.

Any capable member can request agent status, which must be approved by the Vel'Nikeryma. Agents take on duties anywhere in Faerûn. They gain access to passwords, handshakes and symbols that help identify them to the other agents scattered throughout Faerûn.

The Vel'Nikeryma (or Blade Lords) is the organization that acts as the guiding council for the Eldreth Veluuthra. Its' purpose is to gather information from across Faerûn in order to dictate the direction of the Eldreth Veluuthra but, in general, they avoided intervention in individual cells' matters.
Cults require §R3rd§! and §R4th§! rank to be either a §GDivine§! or §BArcane§! caster.

The Cult of the Dragon was founded by the wizard Sammaster (called "the Mad" or "First-Speaker" depending on viewpoint) who believed that undead dragons would one day rule over all of Toril. The cult recruits dragons into their cause with promises of power and immortality, eventually aiming to turn them into deadly dracoliches.
The head of the Cult of the Dragon is the heir to Sammaster "First-Speaker." To fulfill his grand vision requires magical mastery and immense ambition. Only a rare few are capable...

The lowest ranks of the Cult of the Dragon are mostly made up of soldiers-for-hire who are paid a small amount by the cult. They usually have very little to do with the day-to-day operation of the cult and are tested to see if they have the commitment required to officially join.

The cultists are the first rank able to plan, manage, and operate in a cell as a whole. They are primarily made up of adventurers of one sort of another. They often travel to generate financial resources or protect those who outrank them.

Although a cult, the Cult of the Dragon as a whole, does not worship any being capable of granting them any divine spells. Instead, priests and priestesses often serve an honorary role. Though many clerics choose to worship evil gods and cast their spells, it is not a requirement.

Arguably the most essential tier of the Cult of the Dragon are the dragon mages who can cast the spells required to gain draconic allies. Although all spellcasters are welcome to the rank, necromancers are particularly in high demand.
The Arcane Brotherhood is a wizards’ guild from Luskan, shrouded in mystery, whose primary goal is the political and economic control of the North of Faerûn.
The head of the Arcane Brotherhood is known as the Archmage Arcane.
The §YFaerûnian Polytheism§! pilgrims that flock to the holy site in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
In secret, Faerûnian Polytheism faithfuls have organized themselves as a community in this province. From there it converts others, grows, and protects their own.
column3: En secret, les fidèles se sont organisés en tant que communauté dans cette province. De là, la commaunauté convertit d'autres personnes, grandit et protège les siens.

column2: A High Priest in the Hidden Faerûnian Polytheism society

column2: A High Priest in the Hidden Tuigan Shamanism society

The Emerald Enclave was an organization of druids and other nature worshipers on the island of Ilighôn. The actions of the Enclave influenced the lives of the high and low, its members avoiding good and evil to focus on the needs of the natural world and resist the growing influence of humankind. Despite their primary goal of preserving nature, members were not direct opponents of progress
column3: they preferred instead to work with civilized folk to promote the health of the natural world without resorting to acts of violence. Founded on Ilighôn in 374 DR, the Enclave's initial goal was to protect the interests and resources of nature within the Vilhon Reach in the face of despoilers of nature. The House of Silvanus was completed a few years later. After a while, the Enclave began to concern themselves with preservation of nature throughout all of Faerûn. To accomplish this feat, they started splinter cells in other areas that it believed may become threatened, such as the High Forest, Cormanthor, the Wealdath, and the forests of the Great Dale. These cells were small, often consisting of only a few people keeping a close eye on organizations dangerous to their aims. Such groups were known to keep a watch on the church of Talos and the People of the Black Blood.

column2: The three members of the Elder Circle (usually composed of the Masters of the Wild) were followers of Eldath, Mielikki, and Silvanus. Most members worshiped one of these deities and all wore some sort of green symbol. They traveled often, hunting for threats to the natural resources of the Reach and seeking potential allies in other lands.

What if I told you that all you have been taught to believe in is a lie? [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the shape of a pentagram. "The gods need worship much more than their worshippers need them. The Wall of the Faithless proves how scared they are."
column3: « Et si je vous disais que tout ce qu'on vous a appris à croire est un mensonge ? », poursuit [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName], tout en jetant un coup d'oeil autour de nous, avant de remonter sa manche, révélant une cicatrice en forme de pentagramme. « [Root.Get_Le_HighGod] a menti à Adam dans le jardin d'Eden. Rejetez la divinité tyrannique et laissez [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] guider vos pas... »
column4: Was, wenn ich Euch sage, das alles was Ihr glaubt zu wissen, eine Lüge ist?, fährt [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] fort, blickt vorsichtig um sich, krempelt den Ärmel hoch und offenbart eine Tätowierung, nein, eine Narbe in Form eines Pentagrams. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] lügte Adam im Garten von Eden an. Lehnt die tyrannische Gottheit ab und lasst Euch von [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] führen."
column6: Tras echar una mirada furtiva alrededor ha susurrado: ¿Y si te dijera que hay otra forma de lograr tus objetivos?". Se ha levantado la manga y me ha mostrado una cicatriz a modo de tatuaje: un círculo con una estrella boca abajo. "Hay otras fuerzas aparte de [satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe]. Únete a nuestro aquelarre y te las mostraré"."

column2: §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! leaves you alone for now – the circle will be in contact with you.\n
column3: [satanists_recruiter.Get_Le_TitledFirstNameJ] vous laisse seul[Root.Get_E] pour le moment – le cercle vous contactera.\n
column4: §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! lässt Euch vorerst allein. Der Zirkel wird mit Euch in Kontakt treten.\n
column6: §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! te deja a solas por el momento. El aquelarre se pondrá en contacto contigo.\n

column2: It has been some time since [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] was in contact with me. I have been mulling over [satanists_recruiter.GetPossPronoun] words. The priests tell us that those who disavow the gods are bricked into the Wall of the Faithless for eternity. A grotesque threat from scared and dependent deities!
column3: Cela fait un certain temps que je n'ai plus été en contact avec [satanists_recruiter.Get_le_TitledFirstName]. J'ai réfléchi à ses paroles. [Root.Get_Le_HighGod] a dit à Adam qu'il mourrait s'il mangeait le fruit défendu. [Root.Get_Le_HighGod] a menti. Les [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s [Root.GetHouseOfWorshipDuDela] mentent.
column4: Es ist einige Zeit her, seitdem [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] mich das letzte Mal kontaktierte. Ich habe über [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis]e Worte viel nachgedacht. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] sprach zu Adam, dass er sterben würde, wenn er die verbotene Frucht isst... [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] log. Die [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] [Root.GetHouseOfWorshipiminder] lügen.
column6: Ha pasado un tiempo desde aquella conversación con [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Desde entonces no he parado de preguntarme qué pensará [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] si me adentro en ese camino... Por otro lado, [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] ya me ha ofrecido más apoyo del que [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] me ha dado. He empezado a estudiar libros sobre ocultismo y me estoy dando cuenta de cuan intransigentes eran los preceptos que me habían enseñado hasta ahora.

column2: It has been some time since [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] was in contact with me. I have been pondering what [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] would think of me for venturing down this path, but [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] has already offered me more support than my own deities ever have. I have begun studying books on the occult and so far I'm finding the views preached at the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] to be narrow-minded, at best.
column3: Cela fait un certain temps que je n'ai plus été en contact avec [satanists_recruiter.Get_le_TitledFirstName]. Je me suis demandé ce que [Root.Get_le_HighGod] pensait de moi m'aventurant sur ce chemin, mais [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] m'a déjà offert plus de soutien que [Root.Get_le_HighGod] ne l'a jamais fait. J'ai commencé à étudier les livres sur l'occulte, car jusqu'ici, j'ai trouvé étroites d'esprit, au mieux, les idées exprimées [Root.GetHouseOfWorship].
column4: Es ist einige Zeit her, seitdem [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] mich das letzte Mal kontaktierte. Ich habe mir den Kopf darüber zerbrochen, was [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] wohl von mir denkt, aber [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] hat mir bereits Unterstützung angeboten. Ich studiere nun okkulte Werke und bisher scheinen mir die herkömmlichen Predigten im Vergleich bestenfalls engstirnig.
column6: Ha pasado un tiempo desde aquella conversación con [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. Desde entonces no he parado de preguntarme qué pensará [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] si me adentro en ese camino... Por otro lado, [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] ya me ha ofrecido más apoyo del que [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] me ha dado. He empezado a estudiar libros sobre ocultismo y me estoy dando cuenta de cuan intransigentes eran los preceptos que me habían enseñado hasta ahora.

column2: Diabolic outings can be rewarding, but remember that Asmodeus is a cruel master...
column3: Les sorties diaboliques peuvent être enrichissantes, mais rappelez-vous que Asmodée est un maître cruel...
column4: Teufelische Ausflüge haben ihren Reiz, aber vergesst nicht, dass Asmodeus ein grausamer Herr sein kann ...
column6: Puede que los paseos diabolicos sean gratificantes, pero recuerda que Asmodeus es cruel...

column2: This woman has been blessed with the sensuality and infernal allure of Glasya, Asmodeus' favoured daughter.
column3: Cette femme a été bénie avec la sensualité et le charme infernal de Glasya, la fille favourie d'Asmodée.
column4: Diese Frau ist von einer Sinnlichkeit und teuflischen Anziehungskraft wie Glasya, die Tochter Asmodei.
column6: Esta mujer ha sido bendecida con la sensualidad y el encanto infernal de Glasya, la hija de Asmodeus.

column2: Mammon, the archdevil of greed and Lord of Minauros, has blessed this character with overflowing coffers.
column3: Mammon, l'archidiable d'avidité et Seigneur de Minauros, a béni ce personnage avec des coffres débordants.
column4: Mammon, der Erzteufel des Giers und Herr von Minauros, hat diese Person mit Reichtum gesegnet.
column6: Mammon, el archidiablo de la codicia y señor de Minauros, ha bendecido a este personaje con arcas desbordantes.

column2: Zariel, the Fallen Angel of War, has blessed this character with martial prowess.
column3: Zariel, l'ange déchu de la guerre, a béni ce personnage avec des prouesses martiales.
column4: Zariel, der gefallene Engel des Krieges, hat diese Person mit einem Talent für die Kriegskunst gesegnet.
column6: Zariel, el ángel caído de la guerra, ha bendecido a este personaje con proeza marcial.

column2: The devil Titivilus has blessed this character with secret knowledge.
column3: Le diable Titivilus a béni ce personnage avec un savoir secret.
column4: Der Teufel Titivilus hat diese Person mit besonderen Kenntnissen ausgestattet.
column6: El diablo Titivilus ha bendecido a este personaje con sabiduría secreta.

column2: The Archdevil of Trickery has blessed this character with charm and a glib tongue.
column3: L'archidiable de la ruse a béni ce personnage avec du charme et une langue bien pendue.
column4: Der Erzteufel der Täuschung verlieh dieser Person einen besonderen Charme und eine flinke Zunge.
column6: El archidiablo del engaño ha bendecido a este personaje con encanto y labia.

column2: Great Levistus, Prince of Hell, has blessed this character with business acumen.
column3: Levistus, le Prince de l'Enfer, a béni ce personnage en lui accordant un don pour les affaires.
column4: Levistus, Prinz der Hölle, hat dieser Person eine besondere Geschäftstüchtigkeit verliehen.
column6: El gran Levistus, príncipe del infierno, ha bendecido a este personaje con un don para los negocios.

column2: Fierna, the Tempter of the Holy, has blessed this character with a devious mind.
column3: Fierna, la Tentateuse des Saints, a béni ce personnage avec un esprit dévoyé.
column4: Fierna, die Verführerin der Heiligen, verlieh dieser Person eine besondere Verschlagenheit.
column6: Fierna, la tentadora de lo sagrado, ha bendecido a este personaje con una mente retorcida.
